extensionDescription.message: Strelloids - Trello possibilities expander. Custom tags, colored lists, hiding the lists, scrum points, new views and much more.

popup|cards|Enable custom tags for cards.message: To make tag, put their name inside square brackets into card title (eg. "[tag name]")

popup|cards|Enable cards separator|toolt.message: To make separator, start card title with three or more characters: - or = (eg. "--- My separator")

popup|cards|Enable cards prioritization|.message: To set priority for the card, insert into their title one of this keywords: "!1", "!2", "!3", "!4" or "!5", where 1 is the highest priority.

popup|scrum|Enable scrum times|tooltip.message: To add estimation points for card, put it into round brackets (eg. "(3)", "(0.5)", "(?)"). To set consumption points, put it into square brackets (eg. "[5]", "[2.5]").

settings|loopInterval|description.message: Interval between next loops. If you change card title and eg. tags appears with to long delay, you can reduce this value. Too small value, can "warm up" your processor.

settings|Vertical scroll.message: Overwrite vertical scroll on board with horizontal

settings|VerticalScroll|description.message: If enabled you will be able to scroll board in horizontal without holding shift key (just in default display mode).

settings|Allow Tab key.message: Allow use Tab key in card description and comments

settings|AllowTabKey|description.message: If enabled you will be able to insert indent inside card description and comment textarea by tab key. Thanks to this, eg. you can easily create nested list.

settings|Markdown checklists.message: Allow use Markdown checklist in card description and comments

settings|MarkdownChecklists|description.message: If enabled you will be able to insert checklist in Markdown style inside card description and comment. It can be done by insert at begin of element in standard list "[x]" for checked and "[ ]" for not.

settings|Markdown tables.message: Allow use Markdown tables in card description and comments

settings|MarkdownTables|description.message: If enabled you will be able to create tables in Markdown style inside card description and comment.

export|Global settings|description.message: This option will append to the export all your preferences from this whole settings page.

export|Boards settings|description.message: This option will append to the export all your individual preferences for all your boards (accessed from popup triggered by extension icon).

export|Lists settings|description.message: This option will append to the export all your individual preferences for all your lists (eg. manually collapsed).

import|Replace only keys exists in impor.message: Replace only keys exists in import
If checked only settings exists in the import content will be replaced.

import|Remove all old settings before im.message: Remove all old settings before import
If checked first step will be clean up all your settings and the second one will be import content as your settings.

module|ColoredLists|ResetAll|description.message: Will reset ALL above color schemes to default.

about|SourceCode|description.message: Strelloids is open source software. You can check, verify or even edit this code. It is published on GitHub.

about|NeedHelp|description.message: Check the wiki for more help, descriptions and examples.

about|Found a bug.message: Found a bug or have an idea?

about|FoundBug|description.message: I'm not Mr. Robot. I'm making a lot of bugs!

about|Email|description.message: If you prefer the old way of contact.

about|Donate|description.message: If you enjoying, consider donation for more coffee via PayPal.

about|Donate|PayPal button description.message: PayPal - The safer, easier way to pay online!
